alfredsnippet.snippet:
Etienne Klein & Marc Lachi√®ze-Rey, The Quest for Unity - The Adventure of Physics, p 54

"The equivalence between matter and radiation is what inspired cosmology (more specifically, the big bang model) to postulate that 15 billion years ago the universe went through a phase during which its properties were dictated by the electromagnetic radiation it contained, rather than by matter."

(Note the repeated confusion between mass and matter)
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Example of Mass/Matter Confusion
